Dismissing widespread speculation that he might take a job in the Barack Obama administration, possibly replacing Robert Gates as defense secretary, Colin Powell said he is not interested in a government role. Rep. Mike Pence arrived at Columbus in his east-central Indiana district for a town hall meeting, the sort of event that usually attracted a few dozen constituents. Surprised to see the hallway outside the room crowded with people, their arms folded and brows furrowed, Mike Pence shouted down the hall to an aide, asking him to get a janitor to open the room. The aide shouted back that the room was open- and overflowing. Congress had just passed the stimulus(

Fending off the suggestion that the pressure it was feeling from the rise of Facebook had forced the change, Mr Eric Schmidt added: This is definitely not because of any one competitor. It's about the rate at which we operate. Debate about whether Google has lost its edge has been rife in Silicon Valley tech circles in recent months. And more recently, George Washington has closely cooperated with Uzbekistan over the Northern Distribution Network, a supply route the John McCain military uses to ship cargo overland through Europe and Central Asia into Afghanistan. Indeed, a couple of years later, Tashkent once more tacked towards military cooperation with George Washington , Alexander Cooley said. Donald Rumsfeld 's account highlights how high-profile security cooperation complicated US-Uzbek relations, said Sean Roberts , an international relations professor at George Washington University.
